ValidationRule.description: DPAS fields are needed before a case is closed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (ISPICKVAL(Type , 'Place Order') || ISPICKVAL(Type , 'Order Changes')) && (ISPICKVAL(DPAS_Rating__c , 'DX') || ISPICKVAL(DPAS_Rating__c ,'DO')) && (DPAS_Reply_Sent__c = false || isnull(DPAS_Accept_Reject_Sent__c) || isnull(Date_Customer_PO_Received__c)) && ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Done') && $Profile.Name <> $Label.API_data_Load_Profile
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Date Customer PO Received, DPAS Reply Sent fields must be filled in before the case can be closed
